metadata.title: CVE-2023-39434 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A use-after-free issue was addressed with improved memory management. Thisissue is fixed in iOS 17 and iPadOS 17, watchOS 10, macOS Sonoma 14.Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-39434` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.40.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.40.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.40.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.40.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.40.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.40.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.40.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.40.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.40.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.40.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.40.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.40.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.40.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.40.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.40.5-0ubuntu0.22.04.1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
